titleStmt.title: A funerall elegie vpon the death of the late most hopefull and illustrious prince, Henry, Prince of Wales / vvritten by Thomas Heyvvood.
titleStmt.author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Welbie, dwelling in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Swan,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Swan
